title: (BONUS EP) Roommate Crimes
description: This month, the gals "move in" on a couple of vicious flatmate fatalities. Topics include the etiquette of borrowing, some whiskey-fueled payback, and one serious breach of girl code. Split a bottle of Winc's Zwicker White Blend with your roomie, wash your own g*ddamn dishes, and tune in for Roommate Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
